title: Welcome to MemoPro!
content: We're excited to have you on board. With MemoPro, you can easily create, edit, and manage your notes. Simply click on the 'New Note' button to get started, and give your note a title. You can also drag and drop notes around the screen to rearrange them. If you need to edit a note, simply click on it and select the 'Edit' option. And if you're done with a note, you can delete it by selecting the 'Delete' option. We hope you enjoy using MemoPro and it helps you stay organized and productive!
